install.name: Conference
install.author: Age
install.description: Компонент для конференции. Включает в себя регистрацию участников, заказ номера в гостинице и отправку тезисов

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__register` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `surname` varchar(50) default NULL, `name` varchar(100) default NULL, `academic_degree` varchar(50) default NULL, `job` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `organisation` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `street` varchar(100) default NULL, `city` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `region` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `country` varchar(50) default NULL, `post_code` varchar(20) NOT NULL default '', `phone` varchar(20) NOT NULL default '', `fax` varchar(20) NOT NULL default '', `email` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `username` varchar(150) default NULL, `acomodation_person` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `sex` varchar(2) NOT NULL, `date_of_birth` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `house` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `flat` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `academic_rank` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `course_group` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `dept` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `hostel` tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=0 ;

CREATE TABLE `#__hotel` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `hotel` varchar(50) default NULL, `type_room` varchar(100) default NULL, `visit_date` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `exit_date` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `wish` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `username` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=0 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__tesis` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `authors` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `name_lecture` text NOT NULL, `type_lecture` varchar(50) default NULL, `username` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `file_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `supervisor` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `sections` varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=0 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__params` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `type` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `value` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=307 ;
